title: Camel, one of a pair
description: tan camel standing on a ceramic base; two white humps; white tail; large white spots on hindquarters and shoulders; large white areas at tops of legs; underside of tail has red stripes; pair of grooms (L2005.40.1.1-.2) and pair of camels (L2005.40.2.1-.2) are a set
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
